parameters.label: Input images
parameters.description: Multimodal input images for a subject

image.name: inputImage1
image.description: Input image modality 1, outputs are generated in this space
image.label: Input image 1

directory.name: atlasDir
directory.label: Atlas Directory
directory.description: Directory that contains an atlas composed of a template image and prior probability images (template.mha, 1.mha, 2.mha, ... , n.mha)

string.name: atlasOrient
string.label: Atlas Orientation
string.description: Orientation code for images in the atlas (e.g., RAI, LPS, etc). L = left, R = right, A = anterior, P = posterior, I = inferior, S = superior.

float-vector.name: priorAdjustVec
float-vector.label: Prior weight adjustments
float-vector.description: Global scaling factors for adjusting prior weights (list of comma separated numbers with the same count as number of prior images).

parameters.label: Speed
parameters.description: Options for parallel execution and efficiency

integer.name: NumberOfThreads
integer.description: Number of threads used for ITK filter modules
integer.label: Number of threads:

string-enumeration.name: RegistrationMode
string-enumeration.description: Registration mode, for selecting faster or more accurate estimation.
string-enumeration.label: Registration Mode:

integer.name: FilterIterations
integer.label: PreFiltering iterations:
integer.description: Number of iterations for initial image filtering (0 = off)

float.name: FilterTimeSteps
float.label: PreFiltering time steps:
float.description: Time steps for initial image filtering for each modality

integer.name: biasDegree
integer.description: Maximum polynomial degree for the bias field, typically from 4 to 6
integer.label: Bias Field Polynomial Degree (0 = off):

string-enumeration.name: InitialDistributionEstimator
string-enumeration.description: Type of initial distribution estimator, can be standard using sample mean and covariance or robust using the fast MCD estimator
string-enumeration.label: Initial distribution estimator:

string-enumeration.name: atlasMapType
string-enumeration.description: Type of linear transform for atlas mapping (rigid, affine, identity). Use identity when the first image is already in atlas space.
string-enumeration.label: Atlas Transform Type:

string-enumeration.name: coregMapType
string-enumeration.description: Type of transform for mapping between modalities (rigid, affine, identity). Use identity when all images are pre-registered to the space of the first image.
string-enumeration.label: Coregistration Transform Type:

integer.name: atlasFluidIters
integer.label: Atlas Warping Fluid Iterations (0 = off):
integer.description: Number of iterations for computing fluid warps that map atlas to subject

float.name: atlasFluidMaxStep
float.label: Atlas Warping Fluid Maximum Step:
float.description: Maximum step size for fluid warp estimation via gradient descent
